profileText: a Representative from Ohio; born in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, December 4, 1976; graduated from Talawanda High School, Oxford, Ohio, 1995; B.A., Ohio University, Athens, Ohio, 1999; M.A., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2004; teacher; director, Ohio office of faith-based and community initiatives; nonprofit executive; member of the Cincinnati, Ohio, city council, 2018-2022; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 2023-present).
